title: Fix Killtimers please / Jhin's Q stops bouncing

embed.description: I kinda messed up the timer when Lucian died so you can add like 0,1-0,2 seconds.. but it still doesnt affect the proof :D NOTE: I just had a really funny discussion with Sion and I'm not toxic. lel ..btw I also do have him in my friedlist now

body:
I dont know why but I couldn't get the Quadra after the Triple Kill, maybe my information is outdated but what I've found out is that theres always 10 seconds between the kills except from Quadra -> Penta (30s).

Some more information in the Videodescription. 

And there's another bug with Jhin's Q where it stops bouncing when you also autohit the minion (haven't tried with monsters and champs yet)  at the same time.
But it doesnt happend always!

replies.body: Ja mir ist halt auch genau das gleiche aufgefallen...
